value.name: Detectives investigating murder of police officer in Derry in 1993 arrest man (51)
value.description: Detectives from the PSNI Legacy Investigation Branch investigating the murder of police officer Michael Ferguson in January 1993, yesterday arrested a 51-year-old man in Derry as part of their ongoing enquiries into the killing.

value.name: Man arrested in connection with killing of Catholic policeman in Derry
value.description: Constable Michael Ferguson (21) from Omagh was shot twice in the back of the head by the IRA while on duty in Shipquay Street on January 23, 1993.

value.name: Man arrested amid probe into police officer’s murder
value.description: A man has been arrested by detectives investigating the murder of police officer Michael Ferguson in Londonderry in January 1993. The 21-year-old RUC officer from Omagh was shot twice at close ...

value.name: Man (51) taken to Belfast by detectives probing 1993 Derry murder of RUC officer Michael Ferguson
value.description: Detectives probing the 1993 murder of an RUC officer in Derry city centre have arrested a man and taken him to Belfast for questioning.

value.name: The Tasmanian town of Kingston is booming, but at what cost?
value.description: A boom in housing developments in the southern Tasmanian town of Kingston has some residents concerned the area's services and infrastructure are not keeping pace.

value.name: Man arrested over 1993 murder of RUC officer Michael Ferguson due in court on explosives charges
value.description: A 59-year-old man has been charged with acquiring explosives after being arrested during searches by detectives in connection with the murder of an RUC officer in Derry in 1993.

value.name: New chief appointed at Office of Local Government
value.description: Former Liverpool City Council CEO Kiersten Fishburn has been appointed as chief executive of the NSW Office of Local Government. Her appointment follows the departure of Tim Hurst, who found himself at the centre of controversy over the administration of the $250 million Stronger Communities Fund,

value.name: Police arrest five men under Terrorism Act in Derry
value.description: Detectives from the Police Service of Northern Ireland have today (Wednesday) arrested five men under the Terrorism Act in Derry.

value.name: Londonderry: Five men arrested over terrorism offences
value.description: Five men have been arrested in Londonderry over the murder of an RUC officer in 1993 and the attempted murder of a police officer in April. Two men, aged 48 and 59, were arrested over the 1993 murder of Constable Michael Ferguson in Derry.

value.name: Hempfield woman accused of DUI, homicide by vehicle in fatal motorcycle crash on Route 66
value.description: A 33-year-old Hempfield woman is accused of being drunk when she crashed into a motorcycle last year, killing the driver. Tuesdae M. Checque was arraigned this week on multiple criminal charges, including homicide by vehicle while DUI,

value.name: McGuinness associate arrested in probe into RUC man’s murder
value.description: An associate of former Sinn Féin leader Martin McGuinness has been arrested in connection with the murder of a police officer in Londonderry 28 years ago.

value.name: Five men arrested in Co Londonderry under terrorism act
value.description: They are being questioned over the attempted murder of a police officer last month and the murder of an officer in 1993.

value.name: Gutwein ministry shake-up targets health, TAFE
value.description: Tasmanian Premier Peter Gutweins new cabinet hands the difficult health portfolio to one of his most experienced lieutenants and places a battle-hardened minister in charge of contentious TAFE reform.
